Review_Text:
I took a sip and found it to my flavour
I admit I stumbled across this
But
I drank it all in
Every last bitThe challenge now is to watch every Dracula film and rewatch the many I have consumed and maybe even make a short film in the lakes.This has made me thirsty for more!Thaaank you Gatiss and your team.

Another absolutely brilliant documentary from Mart Gatiss. This guy really knows his horror. He always goes back to the beginnings and explains things really well and effortlessly. I really enjoy hearing his takes on films which in turn, makes me see some films in a different light. Can't wait to see what he does next.
